channel.title: BRAIN PLUMBING
channel.description: Education platform for politics, economics, philosophy and science

item.title: Summaries of some important political thinkers
item.description:
• Noam Chomsky
  • Slavoj Zizek
  • David Runciman
  • Francis Fukuyama
  • Ange-Marie Hancock
  • Melissa Harris-Perry
  • Bell Hooks
  • Zilah Eisenstein
  • Thomas Ferguson
  • John Gray
  • Peter Sloterdijk
  • George Monbiot
  • Marilyn Waring (Move to economist page)
  • Camille Paglia
  • Gloria Steinem
  • Adam Curtis
  • Amartya Sen
  • Murray Bookchin
  • David Graeber
  • Medhi Hasan
  • E. P. Thompson
  • Edward Said
  • Naomi Klein
